**General Information:**

ClamHost Xen VPS's with 1024MB of RAM, 25GB of RAID 10 HDD Storage, 1 IPv4 included, 20Gbps DDoS Mitigation, hosted in our quarter cab in Los Angeles. All our VPS are Unmanaged by default for a extra $5 Per Month we offer a Fully Managed VPS Product. we can help with mutiple software configurations. Just email sales@clamhost.com if you have any questions. relating to any of our products and services.
